Help & Tips

Supported Formats

  • PDF documents
  • PNG, JPG, JPEG images
  • TIFF files
  • Max size: 10MB

PII Detection

  • Names and personal identifiers
  • Email addresses
  • Phone numbers
  • Social Security Numbers
  • Addresses
  • Credit card numbers

Security

  • Files processed locally
  • No data stored on servers
  • Automatic cleanup after processing
  • Cryptographic audit trails

Need More?

For batch processing and advanced features, try our CLI tool or REST API.
